array.string: fixed: opendirectory plug-in to set Auth-Type (src/modules/rlm_opendirectory/rlm_opendirectory.c)
fixed: opendirectory plug-in for OD queries on 64-bit arches (src/modules/rlm_opendirectory/rlm_opendirectory.c)
fixed: ms-chap2 plug-in for OD queries on 64-bit arches (src/modules/rlm_mschap/opendir.c)
added: code to eap plug-in to extract private key password (src/modules/rlm_ap/types/rlm_eap_tls/rlm_eap_tls.c
changed: ms-chap2 plug-in to handle NOP from OD for AD users & do NTLM auth (src/modules/rlm_mschap/rlm_mschap.c)
changed: OD ms-chap2 to return NOP for AD users so NTLM auth can be used (src/modules/rlm_mschap/opendir.c)
